title: 3 Bedroom Available on Michigan Ave! Doorman, Sundeck, Indoor Pool
posting_body: ['Gorgeous and Spacious 3 Bedroom/2 Bath Available', '--Live on Michigan Ave Next to Millennium Park!--', 'Building: Millennium Park Plaza', '151 N Michigan Ave, Chicago IL 60601', 'Located on the corner of Michigan Ave and Randolph - next to Millennium Park, the iconic Bean!', '-Great location, few blocks away from Navy Pier, Lake Michigan Beach and Restaurants.', '-The building has 38 floors total', 'The only utility you are responsible for is electric.', 'There is even complimentary fiber internet and DirecTV!', 'Apartment Features:', '-Great amount of natural light', '-Gorgeous city views', '-Spacious closet space', '-Modern kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher', '-Individually controlled heating and cooling', 'Building Complimentary Amenities:', '--Indoor Heated Pool', '--24/7', 'Doorman', '--24/7 Gym Fitness Center', '--Yoga Studio', '--Rooftop Sundeck', '--Locker Room with Steam Showers', '--Business Centers/Conference Rooms with free Wi-Fi and printing', '--Bike Storage', 'Indoor, covered parking garage with valet services in the building available for monthly purchase for $260/month.', 'Pet-friendly!', 'Cats and Small dogs allowed (up to 35 lbs)', "This rare apartment won't last long!", 'Contact me today!', 'Heather Pozzi', 'Leasing Consultant', 'Millennium Park Plaza', 'Millennium Park Living, Inc', 'Equal Opportunity Housing', 'Prices are subject to change']
